entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 12:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -4.4°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: ENE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain showers in the evening then to a few flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain early in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 in the evening then falling. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
